oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Original wills, Arthur, Ann, 1851 May 06
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An original will of Ann Arthur, dated May 6th, 1851, with a codicil dated June 10th, 1851. Illustrates the first page of the document. The verso: “Recorded in Book 15, page 461 & 462.” Forms part of Record Group 16, Original Wills, 1780-1925.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Arthur family
